Module com.cab302.wellbeing.model
Package com.cab302.wellbeing.controller

Class themeController

java.lang.Object
com.cab302.wellbeing.controller.themeController
public class themeController extends Object
This class is responsible for controlling the theme. It provides functionalities such as changing the theme colors.
